description: A comprehensive process template for managing business processes in Azure DevOps

customization.description: This template extends the Agile process with custom work item types for business process management

workItemTypes.name: Business Process
workItemTypes.description: Represents a business process that needs to be documented and managed

workItemTypes.name: Process Step
workItemTypes.description: Represents an individual step within a business process

workItemTypes.name: Process Document
workItemTypes.description: Documentation related to a business process

fields.name: Process Owner
fields.description: The person or team responsible for this process

fields.name: Process Category
fields.description: Category or domain of the business process

fields.name: Compliance Required
fields.description: Indicates if this process has compliance requirements

fields.name: Last Review Date
fields.description: Date when the process was last reviewed

fields.name: Next Review Date
fields.description: Date when the process should be reviewed next

rules.name: Default Process Priority
rules.description: Sets default priority for new processes
rules.condition: When a work item is created
